name: Monopoly La fée Clochette (Tinkerbell-Monopoly)
description:
This french based language is a uncausual adaptation of Monopol board game.

The interfaces are interactives and gameplay's amazing : great graphics, nice music, good gameplay and attractive playing. 

You can play Tinkerbell Monopoly with 12 players

NOTE : I lost the project because of someone bad, so it exists some bugs (money algorythms, alignments bugs).
